name: SOCK RUN - [v0.1 - prototype stage]
description: Welcome to the wacky world of "Sock Adventure"! This exciting platformer game will have you jumping, sliding, and bouncing your way through a world made entirely of socks. You play as a brave little sock, determined to save your fellow socks from the evil washing machine that's been stealing them away. With colorful graphics and catchy music, this game is perfect for kids of all ages. Use your sock powers to defeat enemies and collect power-ups as you make your way through each level. Are you ready to join the sock revolution and save the day? Let's go!
